answers.answer: hi,what is your age and were you ever examined for diabetes?.In case of fibromyalgia,similar kind of symptoms do happen.Please consult Neurologist for evaluation.

question: Hi Doctor,For the last three years I have a burning sensation all over my skin, including myface,eyelid,scalp,stomach,back,legs,hands,penis,fingers and the soles of my feet. I feel this sensation in circular areas on different parts of my body. I also go for frequent urination.I have acidity problem and motions are not regular.I feel like vomiting in morning while brushing my teeth.My tongue has white deposit. i m not able to sleep properly as i go to the toilet for urination atleast 3 times every night.i also get tensed and stressed very fast.Please help me.
title: Burning sensation on different parts of body.
